name: Buff Original Ecostretch Multifunctional Headwear - Unisex
description:
A versatile tube that can be worn as a headband, mask, balaclava, beanie or neck warmer. The seamlessly knit tube is made from recycled PET bottles.Made from breathable and quick-drying recycled polyester with a hint of elastane for stretch.Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection.Dimensions are 53 x 24.5cm.

        Sustainability
